<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2468</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The CHosen: Bible Stories for Children</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das CHosen: Bibel-Geschichten für Kinder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le CHosen : Histoires de bible pour des 
enfants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O CHosen: Histórias do bible para 
crianças</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il CHosen: Storia della bibbia per i 
bambini</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το CHosen: Ιστορίες Βίβλων για τα παιδιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El CHosen: Historias de la biblia para los 
niños</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">FLash movies of bible stories for children, acccompanied by Music and includes games.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible stories</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grelle Filme der Bibelgeschichten für Kinder, 
acccompanied durch Music und schließen Spiele ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les films instantanés des histoires de bible pour
des enfants, acccompanied par Music et inclut des jeux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os filmes fLash de histórias do bible para 
crianças, acccompanied por Música e incluem jogos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I film istantanei delle storia della bibbia
per i bambini, acccompanied da Music ed include i giochi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">FLash οι κινηματογράφοι των ιστοριών Βίβλων για τα 
παιδιά, από τη μουσική και περιλαμβάνουν τα παιχνίδια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las películas de destello de las historias de la 
biblia para los niños, acccompanied por Music e incluyen juegos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibelgeschichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoires de bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">religion</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">histórias do bible</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θρησκεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">historias de la biblia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">religión</string>
          </keyword>
